Have a lovely weekend,

Lucy

time: 15mins

@jaime can you please help me with the task below?
"Under 'All News' on RR Wordpress, third one down, Spotlight on our Health Professionals.

I have an image of each health worker to accompany their bio. I'm just unsure how I get each image next to each bio.

My request: In a circle frame, next to their particular bio, is adding each health worker's image in something you can build and implement?"

Here's the link: https://royalrehab.com.au/?post_type=news&p=17739&preview_id=17739&preview_nonce=1396f32a34&preview=true&_thumbnail_id=17959

Hi Rica,

Thanks for offering your support to this. Turns out, I gave it a go myself and managed to do it 😊

There is one other thing for this newsletter for on our website which I will need to draw on your help for…

Under 'All News' on RR Wordpress, third one down, Spotlight on our Health Professionals.

I have an image of each health worker to accompany their bio. I'm just unsure how I get each image next to each bio.

My request: In a circle frame, next to their particular bio, is adding each health worker's image in something you can build and implement?

Then of course moving forward and for future instances, I can then simply copy this page. Woo!

Images attached.

Ta,

Lucy

Yes, we can set them live on March 22. We'll wait for the copies and images then.

Hi Rica,

Definitely the latter option - publish and make them private.

Is it possible to set a go-live date on them too?

Also, not all images are approved just yet so I will send those on as they come through. No biggie for now, just so long as they're all good and in place by 22 March.

I hope that works and makes sense?

Thanks,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy,

Thank you for the details. If we saved the articles to "draft" it will only have a link that is viewable if you are logged in to the WP admin. The good news is we can save the articles as pending review or publish them and make them private. In that way, the article can not be viewed publicly and we will have a working URL for it.

How does that sound?

Thanks so much Rica! I have a question and hope you can help?

As the newsletter will be in HTML format, I need the URLs for linking back to the Royal Rehab and MetroRehab websites BUT the newsletter isn't being distributed until 22 March.

So my question: Can the articles be added and saved as 'drafts' yet still generate a URL?

Hope that makes sense and thanks heaps!

Lucy

LUCY AVATI​

Hello Lucy,

Thank you for the heads up. We'll be more than happy to help you with the upcoming articles and stories. I bet they are spectacular! Just send us the copies and images when available then reply to this thread so we can get it started.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Dear WP Perk team,

Hope this email finds you all well.

I'd like to give you a heads up on updates which will be coming your way. If you can support and please add to these pages of the Royal Rehab website, that would be appreciated:

https://royalrehab.com.au/news-events/news/
https://royalrehab.com.au/news-events/client-stories/

Currently, I'm waiting on final approvals for articles and stories for my upcoming newsletter, Rehab Matters, and then I'll advise which page I'd like these added to and provide images too.

ETA on this will either be Friday of this week, or early next week.

Many thanks,
Lucy
